overview:
Peter Navin is Senior Vice President of Human Resources, responsible for all of Shutterflyâ€™s human resources initiatives including recruitment of new employees, compensation, benefits, organizational design, learning and development, and workplace culture. Peter brings more than 15 years of human resources, operations and M&A experience.

Peter joined Shutterfly from Electronic Arts, where he served as Vice President of Human Resources and was the HR executive responsible for the companyâ€™s Games Label, its largest creative and marketing business, and for mergers and acquisitions. Prior to Electronic Arts, he served as Vice President of Corporate Operations and Human Resources at ChemConnect, a venture-backed Internet-based company. His previous experiences include serving as Vice President, Human Resources at Brown Brothers Harriman & Co., Vice President, Human Resources of First Physician Care, Inc., and Human Resources Generalist at Blue Cross Blue Shield of Massachusetts.

He earned his Bachelor of Arts in American History from Catholic University of America.

In his free time, Peter enjoys spending time with his wife, daughter and son. You can also find him sailing, playing soccer or golf and taking lots of pictures, of course.
